de.hotware.hotsound.audio.player

Class StreamMusicPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hotware.hotsound.audio.player.StreamMusicPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMusicPlayer, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class StreamMusicPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMusicPlayer
    always runs the playback in its own thread but you can pass an ExecutorService instead if you want to
    Author:
    Martin Braun

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean mCreatedOwnAudioDevice 
      protected boolean mCreateOwnThread

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StreamMusicPlayer()
      Default Constructor. initializes without an external Listener.
      StreamMusicPlayer(java.util.concurrent.Executor pExecutor) 
      StreamMusicPlayer(IMusicListener pMusicListener)
      Default Constructor. initializes with the given listener if a musiclistener is passed here, make sure to shutdown the StreamMusicPlayer correctly or otherwise bugs might occur
      StreamMusicPlayer(IMusicListener pMusicListener, java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService pExecutor)
      uses the given ExecutorService to run the tasks. if a musiclistener is passed here, make sure to shutdown the StreamMusicPlayer correctly or otherwise bugs might occur

      void stop()
      stops the playback but doesn't reset the Player. you can restart it via restartPlayback afterwards may lock the call if in multithreaded mode and the player is currently starting

    • Constructor Detail

      • StreamMusicPlayer

        public StreamMusicPlayer()
        Default Constructor. initializes without an external Listener. An instance created with it always closes its resources. so you might want to use a different constructor if you want to use the player several times

      • StreamMusicPlayer

        public StreamMusicPlayer(IMusicListener pMusicListener)
        Default Constructor. initializes with the given listener if a musiclistener is passed here, make sure to shutdown the StreamMusicPlayer correctly or otherwise bugs might occur

      • StreamMusicPlayer

        public StreamMusicPlayer(java.util.concurrent.Executor pExecutor)

      • StreamMusicPlayer

        public StreamMusicPlayer(IMusicListener pMusicListener,
                 java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService pExecutor)
        uses the given ExecutorService to run the tasks. if a musiclistener is passed here, make sure to shutdown the StreamMusicPlayer correctly or otherwise bugs might occur

      • insert

        public void insert(ISong pSong)
            throws MusicPlayerException
        Description copied from interface: IMusicPlayer
        Inserts a Song to the the Player. Possible difference between implementations: some could allow multiple songs to be added, but some could only hold one song at a time uses a default AudioDevice if there is not already one in usage (not closed)
        Specified by:
        insert in interface IMusicPlayer
        Throws:
        MusicPlayerException

      • insert

        public void insert(ISong pSong,
          IAudioDevice pAudioDevice)
            throws MusicPlayerException
        Description copied from interface: IMusicPlayer
        inserts a Song to the the Player possible difference between implementations: some could allow multiple songs to be added, but some could only hold one song at a time
        Specified by:
        insert in interface IMusicPlayer
        Parameters:
        pMixer - if null is passed the AudioSystem uses the default Mixer
        Throws:
        MusicPlayerException
        SongInsertionException - if audio file is either not supported, its line is not available or an IOException has been thrown in the underlying methods

      • stop

        public void stop()
          throws MusicPlayerException
        Description copied from interface: IMusicPlayer
        stops the playback but doesn't reset the Player. you can restart it via restartPlayback afterwards may lock the call if in multithreaded mode and the player is currently starting
        Specified by:
        stop in interface IMusicPlayer
        Throws:
        MusicPlayerException - if stopping fails
